relatedRecords.name: KotLand
relatedRecords.description: KotLand is the biggest Kotlin conference in the Eastern Europe. Speakers from all over the world will share their experience about Kotlin on Android, Server, Web, Multiplatform and Native.

relatedRecords.name: DevTalks Cluj-Napoca 2020
relatedRecords.description: DevTalks Cluj-Napoca is happening once a year and it brings a full day, in the middle of May, of content and connects every business everywhere through the IT Community thus connecting the developers across the world to share their experience with one another.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Bulgaria 2020
relatedRecords.location: Microsoft Innovation Center | Sofia Tech Park | 111B, Tsarigradsko Shousse Blvd | 1784 Sofia | Bulga
relatedRecords.description:
A unique community event that will take place on April 25, 2020 for the seventh time in Bulgaria . One day deep dive class to help thousands of people get up to speed on developing Cloud Computing Applications for Microsoft Azure.
The event will be focused on technical sessions in several tracks.
